$interpreted: Theodore: I understand the situation. You may take your leave.
General: Yes, your Majesty.
Ralph: Your Majesty.

Theodore: What brings you here?
I believe I didn't request your presence.
Ralph: It was of my own accord... news has it Your Majesty issued an emergency notice, calling for all armies to return to the Capitol at once?
Theodore: Oh, so that's what you are here for...
Theodore: The two hostages of ours have been taken away by the Aldric family.
Theodore: I'll be damned! Daring to attempt such actions under my watch, the young master of the Aldric family is really starting to get on my nerves!
Ralph: WHAT? Your Majesty, I shall retrieve the hostages right this instant!
Theodore: HALT!
Theodore: You imbecile! What are you going to do, poke around the Aldric family until they confess?
Ralph: Of course, they have betrayed Your Majesty!
Theodore: What if the Aldric family refuses to admit any involvement with this incident?
Ralph: But......will they?
Theodore: I recalled all our troops as a warning to the Aldric family, so they would not try anything funny.
Ralph: What Your Majesty means is......
Theodore: They can save whoever they want behind the scenes, but should they dare to openly defy me...
Theodore: I will not hold back. I'll put the entirety of the kingdom's forces in action and annihilate the Aldric family. Whatever the price that shall be, I'll take it!
Ralph: Could it be...Your Majesty still cares about the legitimacy of your throne, hence you're not willing to break the peace with the Twelve Nobles...
Theodore: The Twelve Nobles are the foundation of the Carlos royalty's rule. Their support of me is what's keeping Angelia at bay right now.
Theodore: You good-for-nothing imbecile failed to understand such basic intentions and almost ruined everything just like that!
Ralph: My, my apologies, Your Majesty...
Theodore: You've been In service of me for years, yet still continues to fail to even show a hint of growth at all!
Ralph: Your Majesty... I swear upon my soul that I am your most humble servant...

Theodore: Hmph. Useless piece of trash.
Loyalty is nothing in the face of stupidity.
Ralph: ... Goddamnit. Don't lose your head, Ralph Lavande! It's no news that you're talentless!
Ralph: (His Majesty Theodore has a point. If I am of no use, forever I shall remain the expendable wimp...)
Ralph: (No, there must be something I can do...)
Ralph: (...Something that would allow me to succeed just once...)
